title: Live from the New Jersey Institute of Technology
itunes:title: Live from the New Jersey Institute of Technology
description:
NJIT President Teik Lim discusses the university’s entrepreneurship and diversity. Dr. Michel Boufadel, Professor of Civil and Environmental Engineering at NJIT, talks about helping communities better prepare for and respond to natural disasters and pandemics. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Markets and Finance Editor Pat Regnier provide the background on the Businessweek Magazine cover story The Crypto Story. Dr. Colette Santasieri, Executive Director of the NJ Brownfields Assistance Center at NJIT, explains how they are assisting communities to clean up pollution. Kim Vierheilig, President of Buildings and Facilities Division at STV Engineering, discusses designing and engineering sustainable solutions for K-12 schools. And we Drive to the Close with Roger Mortimer, Portfolio Manager at KraneShares.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
